text:
@realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs Trump ignores International relations and skips the WHO  meeting allowing China, the European Union and Australia to set the course of fighting the Coronavirus.

Reminds me how Trump took no responsibility here either forcing the governors to fight for supplies and set rules.
